basic.description: This course is designed to enhance the speech making abilities of students interested in a career where these skills are essential. Students are trained in selecting and organizing ideas; conducting Internet and library research; adapting a message to a particular audience; speaking to main points; supporting ideas; and delivering an effective messaging in a presentations will be addressed in this course.  This course is offered exclusively at   the FSU Panama City Campus.
basic.subject: SPC
basic.title: Strategic Speech Making
